ISSUE.TITLE: Clarification about REQUIRED_FIELDS
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: If I am not misunderstanding something In the default behaviour REQUIRED_FIELDS usage [should be limited to createsuperuser](https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/1.9/topics/auth/customizing/#django.contrib.auth.models.CustomUser.REQUIRED_FIELDS). In djoser this seems to be used in non super user registrations too, how can I specify required fields for users registration without forcing them on super users too?
